subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Buckeyes were led by 18 points apiece from their top two scorers, Jared Sullinger and Deshaun Thomas, who helped make sure the Bulldogs would once again fall short of reaching the Final Four.
snippet: The Buckeyes were led by 18 points apiece from their top two scorers, Jared Sullinger and Deshaun Thomas, who helped make sure the Bulldogs would once again fall short of reaching the Final Four.
